ingredients.ingredient: 4 ½ cups finely diced fresh tomatoes
¼ cup Ball® Fiesta Salsa Mix

cookingTips: Use ripe, flavorful tomatoes for the best salsa taste
Follow canning instructions carefully for food safety and proper preservation
Mix the salsa mix thoroughly before measuring to ensure even distribution of spices
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through making fresh homemade salsa with proper canning techniques for safe preservation.
